q_en: What cutting tasks will be completed before April 30, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id WHERE ct.end_time < '2024-04-30' AND ct.status = 2;
steps.description: Retrieve the cutting tasks that will be completed before April 30, 2024

| 1       | January 18, 2024 | Master Sewers     | 1                |
| 3       | January 19, 2024 | Master Cutters    | 3                |

These tasks are on track to be wrapped up before the end of April. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! ğŸ˜Š
